Home » 14S5 Mahāvaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 1 Maggasaṃyutta » 1.4 Paṭipattivagga
1.4.1 Paṭhamapaṭipattisutta
Maggasaṃyutta
Paṭipattivagga
Paṭhamapaṭipattisutta
31.
117Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Micchāpaṭipattiñca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi, sammāpaṭipattiñca. Taṃ suṇātha. Katamā ca, bhikkhave, micchāpaṭipatti? Seyyathidaṃ—  micchādiṭṭhi…pe…  micchāsamādhi. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, micchāpaṭipatti. Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sammāpaṭipatti? Seyyathidaṃ—  sammādiṭṭhi…pe…  sammāsamādhi. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sammāpaṭipattī”ti.
118Paṭhamaṃ.
